captions.text: [MUSIC CHARITY VANCE, "Icing."]
-Hey, everyone.

I'm Bailey from Cute
Girls Hairstyles,

and today I'm going
to show you guys how

to do this adorable
hairstyle that I've
been loving on myself lately.

It literally only takes
about five minutes to do.

It's called the
triple lace twist.

To start off, I've
just curled my hair,

and then parted my hair on
the left side of my head.

Next I'm going to
take a small piece

from the front of my hair on
the top, and split it in half.

And then I'm just going
to start twisting.

Once you've done
your first twist,

you're going to add in a very
small piece into your twist,

and then you're going
to keep doing this.

So you're going to twist, add
in another small piece, twist,
add in another small piece.
This is called a lace twist.

You're going to want to try
and do this as tight and secure

as possible, so that we have
room for the next two twists.

After you finished
twisting your hair,

you're going to take your bobby
pin open it up, and put the two

sides through-- like
around your twist.

And then you're going to
push up into your twist,

and that will keep your twist
about as secure as possible.

Then you're going to take a
middle piece, split it in half,

and then begin twisting, just
like you did your first time.

Once again, you're going
to want to try and do

this as tight and close
to your head as possible,

so that we have room
for our third twist.

Once you finish
twisting, you're going

to take your bobby pin
again, open it up, put it

around your twist,
and then just push up.

And it will keep
your twist secure.
This is our last time.

We're going to take a small
piece from the bottom,

split it in half, and
do the same thing we
did with our first two.

So we're going to twist,
add in a small piece, twist,
add in a small piece.
[MUSIC CHARITY VANCE, "Icing."]

-Once you finish
twisting, again, you're

going to take your bobby
pin, put it around the twist,
and then just push it up.

And there you have
your triple lace twist.

-Don't you guys think
her hair looks adorable?

I know that she's been
getting tons of complements
on it at school.
-Oh, yes, yes.

-And when I saw her
wearing it this week,

I told her she had to
film it for you guys,

so that you guys could
sear it, too, and get

tons of compliments, because
I knew you would love it.

Now I have a new Mom
Minute episode up.

You can find it up here, or
in the description box below.
Make sure to go check it out.

It's been really fun
filming all of them.

And we will see
you guys next week.
Bye, guys.
[MUSIC CHARITY VANCE, "Icing."]

-It's not that your
parents don't love you,
because of course they do.

It's just that every
child is different,

and there are different
things that your
love about different kids.
-Here's Brooklyn.
Hi.
-Did you get her crawling?
Come on, Bailey-kins.

title: Triple Lace Side Twists | Cute Girls Hairstyles
